All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
GameController
This singleton class is responsible for communicating with model and handle keyboard input.
GameCrate
Represents a crate, which is subclass of GameObject with a symbol character 'C'
GameCrateOnDiamond
Represents a crate on a diamond, which is subclass of GameObject with a symbol character 'O'
GameDebugObject
Represents a debug object, which is subclass of GameObject with a symbol character '='
GameDiamond
Represents a diamond, which is subclass of GameObject with a symbol character 'D'
GameFloor
Represents a floor, which is subclass of GameObject with a symbol character ' '
GameGrid
Represents a grid in the game by a 2-D array
GameKeeper
Represents a keeper, which is subclass of GameObject with a symbol character 'S'
GameLevel
Represents a level in Sokoban, implementing
GameLevelHandler
Helps a GameModel object to handle data related to GameLevel
GameLogger
This singleton class represents a logger of the game to write logs in the "/logs/" directory
GameModel
This singleton class is responsible for all data in the game
GameObject
Represents a object in they game, the concrete type is defined by the symbol character: WALL('W'), FLOOR(' '), CRATE('C'), DIAMOND('D'), KEEPER('S'), CRATE_ON_DIAMOND('O'), PORTAL('P'), PORTAL_EXIT('E'), DEBUG_OBJECT('=');
GameObjectFactory
The only thing this factory class does is to offer a static method to construct a GameObject subclass instance given a symbol char
GamePortal
Represents a portal, which is subclass of GameObject with a symbol character 'P'
GamePortalExit
Represents the exit of a portal, which is subclass of GameObject with a symbol character 'E'
GameRecord
Represents a game record of player on a certain game level
GameRecorder
Represents a GameRecorder that helps a GameLevel object to save game records
GameSaver
This singleton class helps to save uncompleted games in to /resource/GameLayouts/ directory
GameViewer
This singleton class controls the GUI and asks the controller for data to be displayed
GameWall
Represents a wall, which is subclass of GameObject with a symbol character 'W'
GraphicObject
Represents a graphic game object, each subclass of GameObject has its own display image
Main
Main class of sokoban project
MusicPlayer
This singleton class represents the music player in the game
